trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> controls.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> class provides a user interface for editing triggers of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
A trigger can be an <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> object.

An instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> class can be invoked by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A> property in the visual designer's property grid control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor"></xref> class.

The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> class when the ellipsis button (…) is clicked on the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Triggers%2A> property in the visual designer's property grid control at design time.
The type of the trigger to edit.
Gets a value that indicates whether multiple triggers can be selected at the same time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false`.
Therefore, only one trigger can be selected every time that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> object is used.
A trigger can be an <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> object.
Always `false`.
Gets the data type that this collection edits.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger"></xref> object.
Gets the multiple data types that the collection editor can create.

The types that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor> instance can create are <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>, and other types that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger> class.
An array of the data types that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelTriggerCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
Edits the value of the specified object by using the specified service provider and context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that provides additional context information.
A service provider object that provides editing services.
The object whose value will be edited.
The new value of the object.
